features: 💙【Lightweight and easy to use】: Weighing only 480 grams, this mop head is lightweight, reducing user fatigue. Its circular end design allows for easy maneuverability, enabling flexible cleaning at different angles.

💙【High-quality material and durability】: Crafted from high-quality materials, this commercial mop head exhibits excellent durability and a long lifespan. It withstands frequent use and heavy pressure, maintaining optimal performance over time.

💙【Superior water absorption】: This commercial mop head, designed in a cotton rope state, offers exceptional water absorption. It quickly absorbs a large amount of water, ensuring efficient mopping and saving time and effort.

💙【Easy to clean and maintain】: This commercial mop head is easy to clean and maintain. It can be effortlessly washed, ensuring long-term hygiene and cleanliness standards, thus meeting the stringent requirements of commercial environments.

💙【Ideal for commercial environments】: Specifically designed for commercial environments such as restaurants, offices, and hotels, this mop head excels in high-traffic areas. Its superior water absorption and robust performance make it an ideal choice for demanding commercial use.

productInformation.value: #61,608 in Health & Household (See Top 100 in Health & Household) #142 in Mop Replacement Heads

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Mop Replacement Heads (Light Blue 3-Pack) 1、Made from high quality materials, this is a mop head made from 4 strands of loosely twisted yarn, cotton and blended fibers. This provides an ideal balance of better performance, long-lasting durability, and appearance, utilizing the advantages of many different fibers - high durability, absorbency, and ease of cleaning - so that it can be used to its advantage to effectively clean floors.2、This mop head comes with a universal headband for attaching side loading and clip-on mop handles. The advantage is that it is easy to install and uninstall.3、75% Recycled Cotton + 25% Rayon Blend Industrial design is absorbent and machine washable with confidence, and this high quality mop head is very durable, which is what you need in a convenient cleaning product!4、Our looped fine cord mop head is suitable for all environments. Specializing in cleaning tools for residential, commercial, industrial and more - Cotton Mop Replacement Heads.

Product versatility Scope of application Cotton mop head is durable and absorbs water well for a clean and comfortable environment.Safe for all hard surface non-scratch floors such as hardwood, tile, stone, concrete, laminate, vinyl and more. Residential style mop head for cleaning with clean and clean durability. Neatly cut thin rope, strong loop end mop head, scratch free on floors for long term use.Commercial Replacement Loop Mop Heads, Light Blue, Pack of 3. Suitable for both wet and dry use, the cotton mop head is highly absorbent and will not damage floors, resulting in no scratches.Industrial mop head for hard floors, suitable for all materials, hardwood planks, tile, stone, concrete and more.

Home Cleaning Mop Replacing Head Long-time use of mop head Hand washable and machine washable, thus extending the life of the mop head. (Tip: After the mop head is washed, we recommend air-drying it to prevent it from shrinking and affecting the usage. On the contrary, it is not recommended to use the dryer to dry it, which will easily deteriorate its quality)

DETAILS Ring end mop head Ring form ends better minimize abrasion, virtually eliminating lint and untwisting. Ring-end dunnage heads are easy to clean, better at removing debris, strong and long-lasting. Absorbent to help you store water for better mopping. Washable and reusable The mop head is made of high quality cotton and synthetic fiber thin cord, strong and durable.75% cotton + 25% rayon blend provides better absorbency and strength. The high quality fibers allow the mop head to be washed multiple times, making the mop head more practical. Matching Our mop head is a universal headband, made from cotton-polyester tape. Fits clip-on and side loading handles.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cotton/Rayon Blend. I Thought They Were To Be All Cotton. Dusts, Mops, Cleans.
reviews.reviewText: These are old style like mopheads, the kind seen in schools, that work with a classic clamp mop handle. These are capable for doing tough dirty jobs, where I want to apply lots of water and cleaning solution to an area, and then squeeze the mop out, then go over the area to absorb all that dirty water back up.These mopheads are, from what I understand, a blend of (75%) cotton and (25%) rayon. To me, they feel slightly lighter, when wet, versus traditional all cotton mopheads, which are much heavier.Because of the rayon, I think this ads to the mopheads ability to clean and hold water more diligently and efficiently, especially as for absorbency, they do absorb.They are easy to use, I simply clamp onto their reinforced head. I have had no issues with their durability, such as loose or disintegrating mop strings.I do not throw mopheads into the wash machine, however, I do hand wash them in the utility sink and/or a bucket. These wash clean and seem to have a faster drying time than all cotton mopheads. If they are too soiled, I toss them.The price is reasonable, at about (20%) cheaper than a competitor [December 2023].Country of origin?Made in ChinaListing accuracy?I think the listing’s emphasis is more on cotton than the rayon blend that these are.WeightThese are about (1¼) pounds (dry) each, slightly lighter than an all-cotton mophead.They arrived shrink-wrapped, which I appreciated.I have no real negative complaints, therefore, am rating them five (5) stars, surrounding my particular use.I hope my thoughts helped add information.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Weight and coverage
reviews.reviewText: I find this to do the job and without the heaviness of some other brands.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great industrial mop heads, no complaints, get some.
reviews.reviewText: They're thick and absorbent, soaking up spills and grime. I tackled a muddy paw print disaster on my kitchen floor, and these guys handled it without flinching. They were also great for my weekly deep clean. The reusability is a major plus, just toss in the washing machine. They come out fresh and ready for more. Plus, there is three in a pack which means I'm not constantly hunting for a clean head.My only small gripe is that they're a bit heavy when wet, but hey, that just means they're doing their job. They are a solid choice for anyone who wants a heavy-duty mop head that can handle anything. These are the big boys. Industrial size for that pass through the mop head and then you clamp the head down on them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality mop so far, good value
reviews.reviewText: I liked that they came vacuum-packed, it was nice that they could take up less space in the cabinet. They are heavy duty, but, not overboard. I've gotten some that were almost too thick to wring out well. Like other mop heads, it seems like it takes a couple mops for them to break in nicely. I meant to prewash a mophead before using it, but, then had company coming over on short notice and had to just use it out of the package as it was. It did work fine like that. Haven't had any loose string yets, though I've only used a couple of times.I will update if they don't hold up, but, so far no complaints and I anticipate they'll last as long as my other mop heads have.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: One of my new year's resolutions was to find more sustainable ways to clean. I bought these wet mop heads to replace disposable pads and the chemical solutions they use. These cotton blend wet mops come vacuum sealed but shake out instantly once you unwrap them. They attached to my standard mop handle (not included) and fit perfectly. Once attached to the mop head, I tackled the basement floor. First time ever. These mops are absorbent. I had to change dirty water so many times, there's no way a Swiffer could have done the job effectively. If you have a big area or dirty job to do, seriously consider old school wet mops. You won't be sorry and neither will your budget. Thanks!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice mop heads for the cost, And washable
reviews.reviewText: I was generally apprehensive until I used them. I have tried others in the past that weren't so well for the cost. These actually weren't bad at all they cleaned the floor good and didn't leave behind a lot of water when done. I primarily used them on my up stairs tile and wood floors and they did a nice job over all.They arrived well packaged. They arrived in good condition. They were of a good quality. They were at an affordable cost.Overall I would recommend these mop heads

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These are absorbent without being so super heavy when wet that you need huge muscles to drag it around - just the kind I was looking for, for home use. I also like that they're blue, so they don't look quite so disgusting as the white ones that immediately turn various gross shades of brown and gray.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars 3-Pack mop Head. Reusable mop Heads. Well made; durable, clean well and easy to keep them clean.
reviews.reviewText: The kCarpoly brand's "3-Pack Mop Head Supplements" appear to be a high-quality and versatile option for mopping various floor types in residential and commercial settings.The heads are well made, durable, and clean well.They are easy to keep clean by either hand or machine washing. I recommend hand washing to keep floor residues out of your washer. If you wash them in a washer, do so alone or with a towel to help balance the load and avoid transferring dirt from the floor/mop to your other laundry.Don't use any form of fabric softener so that you will maintain absorbency in the mop heads.Pros:Durable: Made from high-quality cotton materials for long-lasting use.Absorbent: Cotton rope design effectively soaks up spills and water.Lightweight and easy to use: Weighs only 480 grams (16.9 ounces) and has a circular end for maneuverability.Versatile: Suitable for wet and dry cleaning on hard surfaces like hardwood, tile, stone, concrete, and vinyl.Reusable and washable: Machine-washable for easy cleaning and repeated use.Universal headband: Fits both clip-on and side loading mop handles.Cons:None that we've noticed.General:A product of China.
